title.content-text: 1.1.2 - Examples of Today's Popular Communication Tools

brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts images of popular communications tools: podcasting, instant messaging, and weblog applications.

Podcasting - You can listen to your favorite radio show on your portable audio player whenever you have time and wherever you are. Every time a new show becomes available, it can be automatically downloaded.

Instant Messaging - Instant messaging is everywhere and can include audio and video conversations. IM can send text messages to mobile phones.

Weblog applications -You can express your thoughts online, share your photos, and join a community of fellow thinkers.
